website_summaries.verdict: Not quite as durable as some of its competitors, but a reasonable choice for consumers whose top concern is their bottom line.
pros: A value-priced model that's easy to secure – features a screw-like anchor with convenient handle for leverage
cons: Doesn't hold up very well in windy conditions
Malfunctioning of the tilting mechanism has been reported
No specific details about its UV protection

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to screw into the sand
customer_reviews.text: 2017 Update. 2nd year & same great umbrella. 2016. We just used this for 5 windy beach days in wildwood crest nj. It was easy to screw into the sand. Good size for mom & toddler to sit and play under. I'd recommend this to my family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! I got to the beach with two little ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I got to the beach with two little ones and opened it up to find several of the bars at the top splintered and broken. They are cheap plastic and one of the plastic slivers got stuck in my finger. Half of the umbrella went up and the other side with the broken pices did not making it useless. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella. Better design than others with the bar to drive it into the sand at waist level instead of down by the ground. Tilt function is good and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: The quote unquote sturdy designed fiberglass ribs were no match for Atlantic shore ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this beach umbrella recently, prior to a family vacation at Sandbridge, VA. On day one the umbrella failed in typically moderate Atlantic shore winds. It more or less turned itself inside out on far to many occasions over the course of our week long stay. The umbrella also failed to lock in the vertical position and had a slight tilt even when it was locked at vertical. The umbrella is not even close to being strong and durable as advertised. The quote unquote sturdy designed fiberglass ribs were no match for Atlantic shore summer breeze. Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a well built umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a well built umbrella, I got the 6 ft ones but was a little disappointed they have no vents in the top. The add is a little misleading because it shows vents at the top but does not say anywhere the 6ft ones don't have them. I didn't know this until I received the umbrellas and then I contacted Easy Go and all they told me was the 6ft ones come without vents. I have not had them to the beach yet to see how they will with stand the wind but will update review when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: BROKE FIRST USE
customer_reviews.text: When I was screwing it into the ground I was thinking this was going to be great. So I started pushing up the umbrella and heard a pop...one of the ribs had popped out of its little housing...no big deal...I popped it back in and enjoyed it for a while. Then one of the rib joints popped and I see that the plastic is completely snapped at the jpint... not at all fixable. First day of a week at the beach. So dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CRABB FAMILY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beach Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I brought this umbrella to my local pool and was delighted at how easily it screwed into the grassy area. The "turning bar" is a definite plus as I have arthritis in my hands and this feature worked beautifully. It is lightweight and easy to carry and I love that it only has 2 pieces to attach. The height and tilt worked out perfectly, too. Appreciated the overnight delivery as well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Jazz

customer_reviews.title: We would have loved it but ours was defective.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the umbrella we received was defective. I bought this for my birthday party in Florida in May & once at the beach we couldn't get the umbrella to lock onto the piece that steaks into the ground. There was a hole missing, so the lock could not set at all. We could sit the umbrella into the steak but any sort of breeze whatsoever & we would lose the umbrella so we had to give up on it. I left it at my dad's house in FL since I live in TX but it's pretty much useless for what we bought it for. It would have been great if it wasn't defective.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Carter

customer_reviews.title: perfect shade for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this sun umbrella. well made and cheerful. wind so far , has not affected it. got this for my dogs, for shade in the back yard , since tree had to come down. they love sitting under it and one puts his toys three in his little kingdom. glad i purchased it and they are too.
customer_reviews.author: doglover3

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy , good looking abd inexpensive !!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is amazing , for the longest time I was looking for a sturdy beach umbrella that was not so expensive. After reading the reviews I decided to give it a try to this one and I have to say I was very pleased and surprised how this umbrella looks and works , highly recommend this umbrella !!
customer_reviews.author: Sady

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this product is absolutely HORRIBLE. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is absolutely HORRIBLE. Unfortunately, I didn't use the umbrella until after the 30 return policy expired (finally got a good beach day on my day off). The strap for the bag broke the very first time I put it on my shoulder, the rod to help twist pole into the sand bent - a lot - and the umbrella flipped inside out with a very small breeze. I can't believe EasygoProducts would sell such a poorly made product. Does the company even try their products. Complete waste of money!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Beaudette

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: love it, yes its light weight so I wouldnt use on a very windy day but it did fine on lake michigan beaches. The reason for a mark down, is that it arrived torn on a couple edges and almost worn thru in others. Not happy about that one bit. I do love the colors though.
customer_reviews.author: Yovani E.

customer_reviews.title: A slight breeze will destroy this product
customer_reviews.text: This product snapped in half and flew down the beach about 20 minutes after I put it up for the first time on a mildly breezy day at the beach. I've contacted the company twice to inquire about a refund and have had absolutely no response. The beach was packed with umbrellas, yet mine was the only one to falter. The umbrella broke near the plastic juncture so repair was not possible, either. Very disappointed in this product and would not recommend. Also extremely disappointed that I received no communication back from the company after contacting them about my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Deandra Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Stays put, wind doesn’t knock it out of the sand!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a lot of umbrellas that won’t stay in the sand at the beach. On the first trip I was amazed how easily I could get it to stay in the sand and not be blown down by the wind. When I first recieved the umbrella it was missing a part, I contacted them and they sent me a replacement no problem. Excellent customer service and excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B

customer_reviews.title: Best. Umbrella. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment I’ve ever made! We vacation at the beach every year. My umbrella was the only one that stayed intact and didn’t blow away or flip or anything. Will definitely buy more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: I'm only giving it three stars because the umbrella in ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving it three stars because the umbrella in the picture shows very bright, vivid colors and when I received mine, the colors are very light - almost pastel. Also, it is big but not as big as the picture depicts with the lady standing next to it. She must be only 4 feet tall. :D
customer_reviews.author: hjanx

customer_reviews.title: No Quality in this umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: The canopy was not attached to the ends of the spines when I inboxed it. I attached the fasteners and tried to open it up. The seam at the apex was not sewn and the entire canopy bust fell off. What a disappointment. It was nice colors and had what seems to be a good silver underlining. Too bad it’s going back where it came from.
customer_reviews.author: Your Pharmacist

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and large umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Colors are very good in look , not some dull color Very strong build from inside and able to handle good winds Very easy to assemble ,with all the require button and locks , so things will fit perfectly We can tilt top portion, and to mont in sand it has an handle so can dig dipper, Overall happy with my purchase , highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: bansal

customer_reviews.title: the first time we used it the umbrella was fantastic.. the 2nd time the plastic part that ...
customer_reviews.text: the first time we used it the umbrella was fantastic..the 2nd time the plastic part that was supposed to secure the umbrella open got stuck and we were unable to get it to pop out and secure the umbrella open. cheap plastic..We would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: dhinde

customer_reviews.title: No Vents as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I just received my beach umbrella today it is not vented , on the discription you have posted of this product it states umbrella is vented. False advertising, I would like to return it and at your expense not mine please. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality control. Comes with storage bag, the storage bag arrive with split seam. They use low quality materials in the construction. The umbrella is okay quality. The screw-in pole works well in beach sand. The fabric is sewn poorly and splits at seams.
customer_reviews.author: kpk

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure how this was going to hold up in the wind but was pleasantly surprised. It has a really cool bottom that is grooved which helps get it anchored in the sand. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyonthelake

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great size and stands up to wind very well. Easy set up instructions. The only reason I'm giving 4 and not 5 stars is because the stick to help turn the anchor pole was missing, not just broken off but simply never attached. Still easy enough to just turn the pole itself in sand so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No pin hole
customer_reviews.text: Great deal!! However, while assembling they forgot to drill a hole for the lock pin in the top half of the pole. Other than that a beautiful umbrella
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella broke within the first two weeks of use and that was not daily use! One spine broke. Next, two spines broke and went through the actual umbrella making it virtually useless. There was a crack within the plastic area where the umbrella tilts when it was first received from the manufacturer. This proved to be a problem when attempting to stabilized the umbrella in minor breezes. Contacting the manufacturer and explaining the problems went to total darkness.... no response...no offer to refund monies on the cost of the umbrella... no offer to replace umbrella... Save your money and purchase from another manufacturer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy.. used it on the beach with about ...
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy..used it on the beach with about 25mph wind..held up well...my old umbrella would have bent in half...but the force of the wind made the umbrella rattle and the top kept creeping out of the base pole. Also, I used an external plastic umbrella holder which was much more stable than the attached screw at the bottom of the base pole. When I unpacked the umbrella, I had to insert the ribs into the ends on the perimeter and found that the top screw cap has to engage with the umbrella material. If it slips out, you have to insert the ribs again. Let's see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable for wind.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good umbrella for windy beaches. I set it up in yard and it bent in the wind and is now locked in a tilt position. I can't close it to even return it and am unable to bring it to the beach. I picked this style so the group could easily see our spot.
customer_reviews.author: bobo the cow

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this umbrella in 2018 and it lasted for only two years. The pins that hold the 8 support braces rusted and the braces came loose. The previous umbrella that i had looked similar to this but lasted for about 10+ years. It also had 16 support braces and was much more sturdy in the stronger winds. I would not buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L. Smith Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction-Shoddy materials
customer_reviews.text: Have had this item for a season, using it 4-5 times. The stitching is coming loose and the seems are ripping. More Amazon garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M. Graiver

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I ORDERED AND PAID FOR
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid for a 7-foot umbrella. What I received is a 6-foot umbrella. Didn’t know til I set it up here on beach on fam vacay. To say I am pissed is an understatement. Two beach chairs can barely fit
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella already had stress tears in it when I got it and they didn't drill a hole for the stabilizer in the umbrella stick
customer_reviews.author: Kryztena F.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first time we used it which sucked because we were already on the beach. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Patti S.

customer_reviews.title: ... this umbrella to the beach and couldn't have been happier. It stayed put and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Took this umbrella to the beach and couldn't have been happier. It stayed put and was easy to assemble. It was nice to be able to adjust the top to allow us to stay in the shade without moving our stuff.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer finnell

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Cannot adjust height. The umbrella pole did not have any pre drilled holes. The “holding pole does NOT have any adjusting holes and the umbrella would not be able to go deep into the anchor pole because of the plastic lock. Husband had to drill through the umbrella pole to allow metal securing stick. Good size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: Worked good. looked good and no issues with our umbrella. It was much nicer for husband to put the umbrella into the sand with the screw anchor. It just fit us two with our chairs comfortably underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Paisley

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This beach umbrella snapped on the third day of use. I should of paid attention to the comments before I bought this. It was breezy each day on the beach and the wind picked up the third day and befor we could take the umbrella down it snapped. A piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie G Heim

customer_reviews.title: Just be cautious of windy days.
customer_reviews.text: I loved that I had shade on the beach but forget it on windy days. My umbrella blew right up out of the sand & luckily my friend caught it. It even flipped inside out but no damage to it thankfully. I guess the trick is to make sure you get it firmly deep as you can. Also, I probably should have tilted it against the wind. That might have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Iterp4u

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Not a great product. On our first use a stiff breeze blew the umbrella off the base (it is only held on by a clamp, nothing that goes through the pole). Also on the first use the strap on the bag broke. My aunt bought the EasyGo Beach Umbrella - Giant 8' Rainbow Beach Umbrella and that made it all day even after the wind picked up even more (we had already taken our umbrella down for fear of hurting someone else on the beach). Spend the extra money for the EasyGo. You will be very happy... unlike me
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Snapped like a pretzel
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about the size, weight and the anchor feature and twisting stick is awesome but... the second day at the beach the "tilt mechanism" snapped like a pretzel. I'm returning as soon as I find a box and am now I'm shopping again for something with an air vent and a metal tilt mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: REK

customer_reviews.title: Easy go beach umbrella good performer
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality umbrella, easy to install pole into sand with T-handle. Our umbrella stayed up on beach's in SC and CT being used daily while other umbrellas (cheaper and high end brands) were blowing around our blown inside out. Take the time to install it right and there will be no issues with wind toppling it. Definitely worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: MTD Wyo,Pa

customer_reviews.title: Colorful & sturdy umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Took my umbrella to the beach for a weekend getaway, it was easy to assemble & pack away. It is bright colored & really pretty. It withstood high wind, it's well made & flexible. The umbrella is not heavy to carry & the case makes it easy to haul. I highly recommend this umbrella & I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Doctam

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience.
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 1 minute. The cheap plastic pieces that control the angle broke. Since I was away on vacation and needed extra sun protection for my two-year-old, I had to use electrical tape to hold the umbrella together. I guess you get what you pay for. I tried to return it but had an issue with my printer. I missed the deadline by one day. If I could give zero stars I would. EasyGo means the product will EasyGo and break on you. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella and used it for 1 week at the beach. I stored it inside for the winter, opened it up to use this year and it completely snapped at the tilt! So disappointed and left me in the sun on the beach! BUMMER! Buyer beware, faulty design!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper W

customer_reviews.title: The actual umbrella looked okay but it was missing the ...
customer_reviews.text: The actual umbrella looked okay but it was missing the metal pin used to screw the bottom pole with the anchor into the ground. The chain was hanging off the pole but without a pin and it was not in the box. The carrying bag also had a small hole and the top pole was dented where it fits into the bottom anchor pole but it stil fits... I would’ve probably returned it but I need it for 2 days from now.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Lee-Imhof

customer_reviews.title: Super shady (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: Provides a lot of shade. Easy to put together. A worthy beach item
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyRocket

customer_reviews.title: Really nice umbrella- UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: Really nice umbrella. Bigger than I even thought it would be. Easy to put together. The only two issues I would comment on, and there really not a big deal, is that the strap on the carry bag is a little flimsy and I wished that the sand anchor was slightly longer. Other than that, it's a great umbrella for the price. Almost 1 year and minimal use (literally 8 uses) and this umbrella is completely broken. A small breeze on the beach and the entire thing blew inside out and every rib inside broke away from the material. This umbrella is now useless. Just a shame. I don't recommend this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Tedesco

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for a day on the beach.
customer_reviews.text: lightweight, easy assembly, sturdy in windy beach conditions. perfect size for covering two beach chairs.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella, but Can Work Loose and Fall
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the 3 umbrellas we purchased worked very well. The base screwed securely into the sand. The umbrella was secure in very high winds. However, the top (umbrella part) of one of our 3 units worked loose in the high winds and fell off the base - dangerous! The nylon clip securing it failed due to the buffeting of the wind. We put it back, and watched it slowly edge upward (toward falling again) as it rocked in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Carl R Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's got a little weight to it but not bad. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella did not stand up well (at all) at the beach. The top vents did not prevent it from blowing away, the thing at the bottom used to "screw" it into the sand was much to short & did not allow it to go deep enough for stability, and the tilt mechanism was broken and the umbrella would never stay in the upright position, thus allowing more of the umbrella to catch the wind and.....blow away.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Dement

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job even in normal wind at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Brett J. Erb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Colors
customer_reviews.text: Love this ! Bright colors works great and sturdy in wind.
customer_reviews.author: Kristel

customer_reviews.title: Thank God for Gorilla Tape
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella based on the majority of positive reviews. I took it on vacation to Ocean City, Maryland this week and it failed on the first use. The pole sections would not stay together. The wind was the normal wind encountered on the Atlantic Coast and rendered this product useless. I resorted to taping the sections together to get us through. Do not buy this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny C

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Looking be my new beach umbrella. It's light weight make it easy to carry, especially with the carry strap. The base was easy to twist into the sand and it stayed secure. The 7 foot size was big enough fit 2 to stay shaded.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: While the umbrella looks nice, it lacks the handles at the base which ...
customer_reviews.text: While the umbrella looks nice, it lacks the handles at the base which others do that makes it easier to turn while screwing it into the ground, and worse, the top half of the umbrella could not be securely mounted into the bottom half (there was a locking pin, but no hole, almost as if the two pieces were not matching). The corkscrew bottom was also small compared to others. For these reasons, it seemed like a safety hazard.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Worked great during some very windy beach days
customer_reviews.text: Worked great during some very windy beach days. Only 3 stars because ours was missing the little metal rod that you use to get it in the ground. Luckily my sister had bought the same umbrella, so we just used theirs.
customer_reviews.author: ameggo10

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: There wasn't a hole pre-drilled into the piece that fits on top of the pole in the ground. We got to the beach and figured it out. My husband had to make a hole for it himself. Otherwise, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Beach
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and I like the built in sand anchor. I also like the carrying bag made from the same material as the umbrella. My only complaint is the strap on the carry bag . It broke the first time I used. But the umbrella is great.
customer_reviews.author: grandmaGigi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Took this on my beach trip and it was great! Held up on windy days and the tilt feature was a life saver as the sun changed position throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Fisher

customer_reviews.title: So far so good and I love the attached metal rod that is used to screw in the bottom part. You can feel when the umbrella is in.
customer_reviews.text: Had to order in a hurry to replace a horrid Tommy Bahama umbrella that had not even lasted a season. So far this very attractive umbrella has done its job well. We will see how long it can take the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Fox

customer_reviews.title: Works great on the beach
customer_reviews.text: Works great on the beach. The only issue is when we received the umbrella the bottom pole had a dent in it. So far this has not had any impact but the wind has been calm.
customer_reviews.author: Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Good umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Held up well this summer, hopefully will for many more trips to the beach
customer_reviews.author: D. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Better made items then advertised as if they are.
customer_reviews.text: The piece that holds the chain with the bar an which is suppose to hold up when you adjust the umbrella is made of a very thin metal almost thin as aluminum and it was broke when I received it. Had up up grade to a better umbrella without ever even using the Easy go . Cause it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: fay spruill

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella. Definitely pretty sturdy, I went to the beach on a windy day and the umbrella held up great. The flaps of the umbrella make a lot of noise with the wind so I was worried it would fly away but it held up great. The anchor is also extremely helpful to dig it deep into the sand, although you may need some muscle to get it really down low. My only thing is that I wish the pole was shorter so there would be less fear of it flying away.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa C

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At first we loved it because of the screw anchor. It was very easy to get in the ground. However on a beach there is wind. The umbrella turned inside out and the poles inside snapped and were not usable anymore. If there will be zero wind where you go then they are fine. But not beach material, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor locking device to hold umbrella to lower pole
customer_reviews.text: Good looking umbrella but watch out for wind, the top pole easily comes out of the anchored bottom pole and flies away! Poor hardware on this nice looking umbrella. Will need a different one next summer!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Dave

customer_reviews.title: but I'm glad i gave it a chance
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high expectations for this umbrella, but I'm glad i gave it a chance. It exceeded my expectations and held up for a day at the beach with high winds. I have only used it once but soccer season is coming up so we'll see how it holds up on the field.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Ass 101

customer_reviews.title: Find another umbrella, defiantly not for the beach
customer_reviews.text: The whole was missing in the rod to hold the pin in place and it's not very secure when you put it in the ground, and if a little wind blows it comes out of the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: This was awful at the beach. The wind was too hard and it could not stand up to it. We had to take down and not use. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: SisterG

customer_reviews.title: Durable & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Used this several times over the summer & works great! No ripping and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Zook

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy don't buy don't buy...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Have to return it. First use at the beach and broke into 2 pieces in 1 minute with a mild wind speed. End up has to go to beach store and get a old fashion green color canvas umbrella with $40 and works perfectly well!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trust me! You Wont Regret!

customer_reviews.title: Unbrella good for 2or3 people
customer_reviews.text: Igot the 7ft.Unbrella good for 2or3 people,nice colers,i can't tell you how it will hold up in the wind,goes down easy in the sand,comes with a case. May be next time i will get the 8 ft.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC PAPPALARDI

customer_reviews.title: Significantly MISLEADING COLOR
customer_reviews.text: Entirely wrong color...after buying 10 "rainbow" umbrellas, all matching, all matching the picture on Amazon advert....these next two come in a weak pastel rainbow color...total mismatch...does NOT match picture...
customer_reviews.author: James B. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: The stitching on this umbrella came apart at the top ...
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on this umbrella came apart at the top on the first time we setup the umbrella. We were not even able to use it the first time and only owned it for a few weeks before going to the beach. Now the message is that the window is closed to return it. I am furious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Took this on vacation to Martha's Vineyard and it was wonderful. It's very sturdy and even on a windy day it performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Pole bent upon receipt
customer_reviews.text: Pole was bent upon receiving the item. Returning since it isn't useable. Seemed too lightweight for high winds at the beach anyway, very thankful for free returns but too bad we leave for the beach in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Returning on Monday. Would never buy this again. I think we were shipped a used, returned , haphazardly repaired umbrella. Out of the box two arms werr broken. Seems were sewed shoddily back together. Holes beginning to open up at the top
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: First time out had trouble securing into the sand. An extension anchor might help. Or longer pole.
customer_reviews.author: HappyInParadise

customer_reviews.title: Broke in half on third use. :(
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this item when it arrived. It was a good size, easy to assemble, and very colorful. Then it snapped in two on the third day of use. It might have been a fluke, and the wind *was* strong, but I would buy a different umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H Granger

customer_reviews.title: Love the vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the vibrant colors. This umbrella is sturdy and is easy to stand up in the sand. I would buy it again, and I have recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Cato

customer_reviews.title: A great umbrella for the beach
customer_reviews.text: We used this the entire week we were in Hilton Head and loved it. It gave us the much needed shade to give us a break from the sun and heat. It even stood up when we had two days in a row of yellow caution flag on the beach with high winds. We are considering purchasing a second one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cross

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We used it and it was very windy at the beach, it stood up and did not gave with the wind, great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: BELGICA

customer_reviews.title: Received a defective product
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella was defective right out of the package, the top part of the fabric was unstitched from the metal pole and the bottom was disjointed from the tip of the metal rods, the bag had signs of having been cut with scissors. My guess is that I received a product that another customer had returned
customer_reviews.author: Kubus

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The worst umbrella ever. The pole did not fit into the other end, therefore only a part of the pole could be slided down and the total length of the pole was very long. Also the whole where you would secure the pole with a pin was unusable since the pole would not slide more down. While folding the umbrella it the detached from the top, which made the umbrella completely useless. It survived one beach day.
customer_reviews.author: Joolz USA

customer_reviews.title: Until then it was a good product, but had hoped to get a whole ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the spokes broke after two weeks. Until then it was a good product, but had hoped to get a whole summer’s use out of this item.
customer_reviews.author: hollybloom24

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Thin canvas tore our first day on ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Thin canvas tore our first day on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Sc

customer_reviews.title: Flips inside out easily
customer_reviews.text: First time out the tilt hinge was forced by a light wind and now the umbrella won't lock and stay vertical. If the wind is much more than a light breeze it flips inside out. Great shade and sun protection but I spend all my time fixing it after a the wind has flipped it inside out. Pain in the neck. I use this at my community pool, won't even try it at the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews stating that the product was deficient for this or that reason even down to the bag being defective. Personally I think the defects were on the user end. This is a very nice product for the money. I would buy it again, and recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Ray

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella is very sturdy and we'll made
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is very sturdy and we'll made. The carrying bag willl make it easy to carry to and from the beach. We won't get to use it until we go south this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Untrauer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well even in the wind! Even sheltered us from a downpour! The adjustable top is awesome! Screwed into the sand easily with handle. Totally satisfied with this umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: PattiB

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use over our grandson's kiddie pool. It works great if you leave it up right, however if you tilt it the wind rotates it round and round so that function is not useful to us. Overall a nice umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: A. Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I now have three of these. Lightweight and they last.
customer_reviews.author: Chapel Hill Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my granddaughter's water table. Easy to set up and just enough shade for all.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella for the $. Was a great birthday present
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great inexpensive beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: My fault but I wish I had a ,arger size.....9.5 to 10 ft. But the picture seemed larger
customer_reviews.author: John Brady

customer_reviews.title: 7' rainbow umbrella
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for a recent beach trip. worked great! the fiberglass ribs are tough and held up to three windy days at the beach. the sand anchor worked perfectly. great quality for decent prive.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Functional
customer_reviews.text: We took this to Gulf Shores AL, and it was pretty windy. Our umbrella stood firm and kept us covered. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, terrible, terrible! Would not stay in ground and broke at the first strong wind!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Spend more and get better!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality and impossible to return!!! Broke the first time we used it! Spend more and get better!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Poor
customer_reviews.text: I returned both of mine. One came missing the hole for the Lynch pin so there was no way to connect the parts. The second came out of the box busted. Incredibly disappointing for the price. Cheap, light construction. Not worth $42.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa W.

product_meta.title: EasyGO Rainbow Beach Umbrella - Portable Wind Beach Umbrella – Folding Beach Umbrella Set with Screw Anchor and Carrying Bag
product_meta.description: Our EasyGo Rainbow Beach Umbrella is light-weight and has a rust-free anodized aluminum pole with height adjustment options. The Push Button Tilt Mechanism tracks the sun and maximizes your shade making for a great beach umbrella canopy and palm beach umbrella. With fiberglass ribs providing enhanced durability and extended protection, our large beach umbrella holder stands strong in windy conditions. It is also vented for better air release to avoid cover inversion unlike other beach tents or wind beach umbrellas. Made from extra thick walled nylon/plastic, the heavy duty screw will go into dirt, grass and sand easily. Use the included screw handle to rotate your pole into the ground/sand for a very stable design! This summer beach umbrella has UV protection creating a great kid’s beach umbrella or baby beach umbrella. The carrying bag included with purchase makes this folding beach umbrella portable and easy to transport.
feature_bullets: HIGH UP50+ UV PROTECTION: EasyGo Heavy duty beach shade umbrella offers you UPF 50+ cover from 99.5% of UVA/UVB. The UV ray protection keeps your delicate and beautiful skin safe from the risk of cancer. The full swivel umbrella has a pole with a silver coating, and push buttons that can be used to adjust the beach umbrella to give you shade from any angle. The sand anchor enables you to move it and place it firmly on the beach to ensure firm wind resistance on a windy day.

DURABLE CANOPY AND CONNECTORS: The rugged canopy cover of this windproof heavy duty beach umbrella is made of premium fabric which ensures maximum sun and rain protection giving you the best protection from the weather elements. The canopy of this premium beach umbrella is made of premium high-quality water-repellent fabric for maximum sun protection.

DURABLE CANOPY AND CONNECTORS: The rugged canopy cover of this windproof heavy duty beach umbrella is made of premium fabric which ensures maximum sun and rain protection giving you the best protection from the weather elements. The canopy of this premium beach umbrella is made of premium high-quality water-repellent fabric for maximum sun protection.

VERSATILE FOR MULTIPLE APPLICATIONS: EasyGo versatile giant multicolour umbrella has multiple applications asides serving the purpose of shading beachgoers from the sun and rain. The heavy-duty windproof beach umbrella with sand anchor is also good for use as an umbrella for the patio. You can use the heavy-duty beach umbrellas for sand as heavy-duty backyard beach umbrella beside your swimming pool during pool parties or while just relaxing during your resting period.

FUNCTIONAL AND STURDY DESIGN: Made of reinforced Heavy Duty nylon/plastic that guarantees hassle-free set up. You may use the included screw handle to rotate your pole into the ground/sand for a very stable installation. It comes with 16 fiberglass ribs for enhanced durability and extended protection during your beach adventures even on a windy day. The vented design of the giant umbrella rain canopy guarantees the best air circulation to prevent it flipping over.
